title: CHANEL
seo_description: Coco Chanel’s double-C-stamped flagship store has served as a landmark for iconic style and luxury since its opening in the 1960s. From quilted leather handbags to tweed suits, Chanel’s brand has managed to hold on to classic elegance while staying on top in the modern fashion world.

Coco Chanel’s double-C-stamped flagship store has served as a landmark for iconic style and luxury since its opening in the 1960s. From quilted leather handbags to tweed suits, Chanel’s brand has managed to hold on to classic elegance while staying on top in the modern fashion world.
